Description:
Microcontroller used for controlling spectrometer, flash lamp,
battery read, module read etc.
Connects arduino to Pi, buck converter, adc, pot etc
3.7 V batteries used to power system

Part: JST connector ( male 5 pin, right angle)

Description: To manage charging and discharging of 18650 cells
Bluetooth keyboard to allow for typing and mousepad
Connects to raspberry pi for viewing desktop
Allows for screws to hold together different device components
Card for Pi OS and software
Connect Pi to screen and arduino to Pi
Connect screen to Pi for power and Touch capabilities
Connect USB flash drive or mouse/keyboard
Allow connection of Pi to PCB board

Main microprocessor used for controlling saving of files and
graphical user interface
